channel.title: Ace Trace Video Editor
channel.description: Recent content on Ace Trace Video Editor

item.description: F.A.Q. How do I add a line? In manual mode you can mark a few points, and the app will create a smooth line using then. Find the object with the cursor in the editor, then tag a [+] plus button to add the point. Scroll video using the scrollbar below the editor. Do I need to buy it? You can play with the app and see the results completely for free.

Privacy Policy When you first use Ace Trace, we ask you for access to your photo library so we can read your videos and modify them. Video data is extremely sensitive, and we believe it’s important for you to know and understand what we do with that data. We firmly believe that your data belongs to you. As such, Ace Trace does not collect, store, or share any videos, or data that can be used to identify or contact a specific individual.
